content: Planning Area in Central, Singapore **Marina East** is a [planning area](/wiki/Planning_areas_of_Singapore) located in the [Central Area](/wiki/Central_Area,_Singapore) of the [Central Region](/wiki/Central_Region,_Singapore) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), covering 140 hectares (350 acres) of reclaimed land. It is the location of NTUC Club's Marina Bay Golf Course (formerly known as the Marina East Course) and the [Gardens by the Bay](/wiki/Gardens_by_the_Bay) (Bay East Garden). Marina East is bordered by [Marine Parade](/wiki/Marine_Parade) to the east, [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang) to the north, [Marina South](/wiki/Marina_South) and [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core) to the west, as well as the [Singapore Straits](/wiki/Singapore_Straits) to the south. Marina East Planning Area should not be confused with the Marina East subzone that is part of the adjacent Marine Parade Planning Area. ## Notes This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Marina East
